item.title: BOAの分析：アマゾンの動画広告プッシュで年間売上は最大50億ドル増加、内訳は動画広告売上30億ドル、プライムユーザーが広告回避のために支払う18億ドル（Spencer Soper/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Spencer Soper / Bloomberg:
BOA analysis: Amazon's video ad push will boost annual revenue by up to $5B, comprising $3B in video ad sales and $1.8B in Prime users paying to avoid ads  —  - Subscribers can pay extra $3 per month for ad-free streaming  —  Amazon.com Inc.'s push into video advertising will boost annual revenue …

item.title: 人気Twitterアカウント「@Horse_ebooks」を2年間運営したジェイコブ・バッキラに、言語ボットの着想やAIチャットボットなどについてQ&A（Kari Paul/The Guardian）
item.description:
Kari Paul / The Guardian:
Q&A with Jacob Bakkila, who ran the popular @Horse_ebooks Twitter account for two years, on the inspiration for the language bot, AI chatbots, and more  —  By reusing and repurposing existing writing into viral fragments on Twitter, the account functioned like today's chatbots.

item.title: MPA：アジア太平洋地域のビデオ産業は2023年に5.5％成長し、売上高1,450億ドルに達し、オンラインビデオの売上高は13％増の570億ドルに急増、TVの売上高は1％未満成長し980億ドル（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
MPA: the Asia Pacific video industry grew 5.5% in 2023 to hit $145B in revenue, with a 13% jump in online video sales to $57B; TV revenue grew under 1% to $98B  —  The video industry in the region grew by 5.5 percent in 2023 to hit $145 billion in revenue, says research firm MPA.

item.title: UMGとTencent Music Entertainmentがライセンス契約を更新、テンセントはQQ Music、Kogou Music、Kuwo Music、WeSingでUMGのコンテンツを配信可能に（Marc Schneider/Billboard）
item.description:
Marc Schneider / Billboard:
UMG and Tencent Music Entertainment renew their licensing agreement, allowing Tencent to distribute UMG content on QQ Music, Kogou Music, Kuwo Music, and WeSing  —  “UMG will continue to work with TME to bring the very best in music to these passionate music consumers.”

item.title: ヘッジファンドがディズニーで勢力争い：ValueActはディズニーの取締役候補を支持、TrianとAncoraはネルソン・ペルツを支持、Blackwellsは他の取締役候補をプッシュ（Michael Flaherty/Axios）
item.description:
Michael Flaherty / Axios:
Hedge funds vie for power at Disney: ValueAct supports Disney's board slate, Trian and Ancora support Nelson Peltz, and Blackwells pushes other board candidates  —  Trian, ValueAct, Ancora and Blackwells — it's a fight within a fight. … ValueAct, in turn, said it would support Disney's slate of directors.

item.title: ブラックウエルズ、ネルソン・ペルツの委任状争奪戦に対抗してディズニーの取締役候補3名を推薦、ディズニーのバリューアクト買収は「失望させる守りの一手」と指摘（Variety紙）
item.description:
Variety:
Blackwells nominates three candidates to Disney's board to rival Nelson Peltz's proxy fight, and says Disney's ValueAct deal is “a disappointing defensive move”  —  Disney and CEO Bob Iger have secured votes of confidence from two key allies in the company's proxy fight with Nelson Peltz.

item.title: Twitchが性的コンテンツ・ポリシーを再び変更し、ストリーマーが「完全または部分的にヌードであることを暗示または示唆」することを許可しないと発表（Jay Peters/The Verge）
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Twitch changes its sexual content policies again and says the platform won't allow streamers to “imply or suggest that they are fully or partially nude”  —  Twitch is changing its sexual content policies again, this time to prohibit implied nudity on the platform.

item.title: 英国編集者綱領委員会、綱領の差別条項をユダヤ人、イスラム教徒、ADHD患者などに拡大するよう求める声を拒否（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
The UK Editors' Code of Practice Committee rejects calls to extend the discrimination clause in the code to cover Jews, Muslims, those with ADHD, and others  —  Leading editors have rejected new calls to extend the discrimination clause of the Editors' Code of Practice to cover groups.
